author: Patriot66
title: The truth about gun free zones
text: Conservatives are blaming ?gun-free zones? for the Roseburg massacre. Seriously. The article says nothing. Law abiding citizens do not kill people. Taking their right of self protection away opens the door to criminals who will find a way to obtain a gun. In California, the police will openly tell you that they cannot protect you. That is primarily your responsibility. In practically every case the perpetrator chooses gun free zones. We will always have criminals and mentally ill people. That is a given. There is no possible way of disarming those people. That is also a given. Knowing that, the only way possible to avoid becoming a statistic is to arm yourself and become well acquainted with your choice of fire arms. For home protection, I suggest a short-barrel 12guage shotgun. Merely pumping a round into the chamber of a shotgun will scare most any criminal.
